text: (Oba abaakaafuwala emirimu gya bwe giringa) ebizikiza ebiri mu nnyanja ey'ennyanga nga ebikkiddwa amayengo ng'ate waggulu waayo waliyo amayengo amalala ng'ate waggulu waago waliyo ebire ne biba bizikiza ebiri waggulu wa binnaabyo (omuntu singa abadde mu kifo ekyo) bw'ajjayo omukonogwe aba kumpi obutagulaba oyo yenna Katonda gwatawadde kitangaala tayinza kufuna kitangaala
